name: GoGoGogos!
description:
GoGoGogos! is a multiplayer platformer game where you as a hardworking Gogo must collect food to feed the people at the drop off!
How to play:
Move the Gogo from left to right and jump to grab food on your head! Then drop it off for points! The first to reach a set point limit (No of Players * 10) wins!

Real SA Hours version is buggy but allows players to steal fruit from each other.

Extra Info:
All the sprites and sounds were made by me. Sprites created using Piskel, sounds and music created using BeepBox. Overall game made in Construct 3 using Table Realms plugins for multiplayer and controls, and local server to run.
